Description: Horisont Energi AS is a Norway-based carbon technology company that provides clean energy, carbon transport and carbon storage services. The Company's purpose is to convert natural and renewable gases, water and renewable energy into clean ammonia and hydrogen, and to offer Carbon Dioxide (CO2) transport and storage solutions using proprietary technology, paving the way for a low-carbon economy. The Company develops land-based production facilities for these products with carbon storage infrastructure on the Norwegian continental shelf. Horisont Energi ASâ€™ activities can be divided into two business areas, Clean Ammonia and Commercialization of Carbon Storage. The Company commercializes carbon storage for the European market.
